summary_blurb: SkillSync is an intelligent resume matching system that uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) to match job descriptions with candidate resumes. Built on Azure serverless architecture with Telegram bot integration for easy access.
summary_bullets: **NLP-Powered Matching**: Uses TF-IDF and Cosine Similarity algorithms for intelligent resume matching
**Automatic Skill Extraction**: Extracts 50-100+ technical skills from resume PDFs automatically
**Smart Resume Versioning**: Tracks multiple versions of resumes (v1, v2, v3...)
